typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{~id} as string,
		{titleType:String} as string,
		{primaryTitle:String} as string,
		{isAdult:Bool} as boolean,
		{startYear:String} as string,
		{endYear:String} as string,
		{runtimeMinutes:String} as string,
		{averageRating:Float} as float,
		{numVotes:Float} as float,
		{~label} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
DerivedColumn1 split({averageRating:Float} > 5.0,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Stream1, Stream2)
source1 derive(owner = "Minura Punchihewa") ~> DerivedColumn1
ConditionalSplit1@Stream1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@Stream2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
